content:
I think that's a fantastic plan! You've covered all the essential elements to make the "Guess the Material" Contest engaging, shareable, and rewarding for your followers. By sharing a high-quality photo, providing a hint, and encouraging people to share their guesses, you'll create a sense of curiosity and excitement around your upcycled home decor products.

The daily prize and leaderboard will add an element of competition, and the grand prize will give people an incentive to participate and share the contest with their friends. Featuring the winner on your social media page will also create a sense of community and encourage people to participate in future contests.

Here are a few additional tips to consider:

* Make sure to respond to comments and engage with your followers throughout the contest. This will help build a sense of excitement and encourage people to continue participating.
* Use Instagram Stories and Facebook Live to share behind-the-scenes content, sneak peeks, and Q&A sessions to keep the momentum going.
* Consider collaborating with influencers or other businesses in the upcycling or DIY space to co-host the contest and expand your reach.
* Share user-generated content and feature followers' upcycled projects or creative uses for the mystery material to create a sense of community and encourage people to share their own projects.
* Use the branded hashtag consistently across all your social media platforms to track the conversation and create a buzz around the contest.

By following these tips, you'll be well on your way to creating a successful and engaging "Guess the Material" Contest that will attract new followers, increase brand awareness, and showcase your upcycled home decor products.

Good luck, and have fun!
